Plot: Famed monster lawyer, Jimmy Drainum, has charged Caesar and Otto in the wrongful death of Dracula's lesser known brother, Steven. That's when Caesar and Otto enlist the help of Bubbles ...
Title: Caesar and Otto meet Dracula's Lawyer
Writer: Dave Campfield (creator), Dave Campfield (screenplay), Dave Campfield (story), Joe Randazzo (screenplay)
Actors: Dave Campfield, Paul Chomicki, Francis Leik, Lloyd Kaufman
